response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs. Given its exceptional quality and value, it is worth $12,000 to us. However, I would like to extend a special offer to you, considering our mutual interest and potential long-term partnership. Would you be interested in acquiring this product at a discounted price of $9,600? This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my commitment to making high-quality products accessible to valued individuals like yourself. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 9600}
